attributes.action: Make the DSA taxi drivers test compulsory in the UK for everyone who wants to become a taxi/private hire car driver
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As I write this petition my husband should be celebrating his 34th birthday but due to the fact that he was killed by a private hire car driver who caused death by dangerous driving he cannot. My husband drove HGV's and he had to take a test to get his licence to drive them, to drive a bus you have to take a test to get a licence to drive them so I feel that in the interest of public safety & improving driving standards that potential taxi/private hire drivers should have to take a compulsory test as in all other professional driving jobs. I also believe they should have annual driving assessments to ensure good standards are maintained. Certainly I believe if the standards in taxi/private hire driving had have been better my husband would still be here today.
